name: Displaced (itch)
description:
You were once a master thief, stealing pockets by day and robbing houses by night. But after recovering from a nasty disease that was wrecking the prison, you awoke to an empty hospital room. Now its up to you to escape and survive whatever lurks within the confines of the prison.

Title: Displaced
Platform: HTML
Genre: Text Adventure
Rating: T
Target Market: Ages 14+
Game Overview:
Displaced is a text adventure where you play a thief waking up from a disease induced coma. However you wake up to an empty building. You must use your wits to survive whatever roams the prison halls. With only your quick thinking and whatever tools you can scrounge up, can you survive?
Instructions:
Click the play arrow to play from your browser.
Game Design Team
Christopher DePalma – Game Designer
